reviews.title: Good gripping white noise
reviews.review_text: Thought we'd try this out for a top-bunk sleeper and it works great. The clamp actually gripped on the cylindrical-tubes of the bunk guard. Angle and speed easily adjustable and it has the right amount of “white noise” to help with sleep. Hope it lasts!

I love this little fan! It's one of my fav purchases of the year. I use it every day, especially nights. As I need some air blowing on me while I sleep. Very low background noise. low space profile. It has two speeds. And there is a noticeable difference between them. They both give off good breeze and not an overpowered wind blow. The clip to hold the fan is big and it opens pretty wide as mentioned in the description. It was a concern as to where I would clip it before I ordered but it was for naught. Your table or edge will need at minimum a good 2 inch cleared length of edge if that is where you want to put it. The clip opens pretty wide too appropriately 3-4 inches. It opens wide and will require some hand strength. Once it's clipped on, it has the death grip on the edge or ledge. It will stay on unless you are fiddling around and pull it off. Yeah, I may have done that. It was totally user error tho. Not "cool breeze" fault. That's MY fan's name. Lol. Cool breeze gives a strong steady breeze. While white colored, not apparent collecting dust so far. However, all Fans will eventually do the dust collector thing. The fun part is that Cool breeze's head will and does tilt, swivel, flip, dip, dive and twirl to whatever direction your heart desires. Her wish is your command. She also has a twist knob so you can lock her into whatever configuration you want. This may be problematic for those with arthritis. The knob is small and in an awkward but convenient place. Again Her wish is your command. So, If you need a small breeze pointed on you or in your space and don't want a bulky fan sitting on your table or floor in your way, taking up valuable space, then this fan is for you. I don't think you will be disappointed. I am not and I was very skeptical. I am considering buying another for my laundry room. Enjoy.

reviews.title: small but mighty..
reviews.review_text: loved this mighty little fan. quiet and two speeds that give good amount air circular stable speed. very pleased with my purchase. the clip is sturdy.
This little fan easily clips to a mirror in the bathroom, and provide provides a nice amount of air for after a shower when you're feeling a bit sweaty because the bathroom is all hot and steamy.

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.review_text: I really like this fan, (bought two of them) I am sure they are efficient to run and, was surprised how much air it moves on the higher setting. And very quiet. Happy I made this purchase. For me, it exceeded my expectations for this very reasonable price.

reviews.title: Awesome little fan for the price
reviews.review_text: I needed a small fan since I have asthma and COPD to help with my breathing at night when I sleep and I also needed a small one for my kitchen that I could just clip onto something the cupboard or something to help when I'm out there cleaning or cooking plus I also love the price I had been trying to find these little fans for a while and finally I found it at walmart.com and I'm very pleased with them

reviews.title: Perfect bunk bed fan!
reviews.review_text: We were kind of hesitant at first to buy this. It turned out to be the perfect size and it fit perfectly on the bunk beds. Now both of my boys will have their own fan. I like how it clips right on, and they can move it themselves to where ever they like. They are 9 and 7.

reviews.title: Quiet, good clamp, lots of positions
reviews.review_text: Won't move a lot of air because, well, it's a small diameter fan. Moves enough for my use within a couple feet of cooled area. Quiet. Would prefer a rotary speed/off select than the slide switch. Like it can be pointed downward since it sits on an above shelf to blow downward. Does not oscillate, but I already knew that, and don't need it for where it is used. Would like the fan blade cage to be easier to separate for dusting (have to use a flat-blade screwdriver to pry the halves apart to get inside to dust the blades). I had one before, and this was a replacement. After near 4 years, the old one's motor bearing were getting noisy. Note: The fan blades are simply pressed onto the motor spindle, so friction holds the blades to the spindle. When pointed straight down, the blades will gradually slide off the spindle which will have the blades bang against the cage. Used hot-melt glue to affix blades to spindle. The clamp was sufficiently wide to handle affixing the fan to my headboard (which has a layer for the headboard, and another layer around the edges for decorative trim). This is very quiet which is needed for a fan near the head when sleeping in the bed. The slow speed is enough to cool me off when sleeping (to eliminate waking up sweaty). The head can rotate fore-aft and the stem can rotate 360 degrees, so it pretty much can be pointed in any direction.

reviews.title: The foam pads in the clip
reviews.review_text: The fan is good .I was looking for this clip fan because my kid bed frame is thick ,so other kind of clip never holds on to it properly .one less star because the parts are little loose so the fan direction always changes and the foam in the clips are not good enough.

it's okay but could be a little bit more powerful and reach a little farther.but it does help and is very convenient.i would recommend to the company the above adjustments.and to the buyer it does help some.

reviews.title: convenient air circulation for almost anywhere
reviews.review_text: I used this fan at work. I have clipped it on the shelf above my desk. Having to wear a mask due to COVID all day at work makes it feel like I'm being suffocated. The fan is just right to circulate air right towards my face and helps me to breathe easier. My only dislike is the flimsy plastic feels like I am going to poke my fingers right thru it as I turn the fan off and on. I wish the electrical cord was a little longer to reach the wall outlet better.

reviews.title: Comfort Zone 6" 2-Speed Portable, Indoor Desk Fan
reviews.review_text: Comfort Zone 6" 2-Speed Portable, Indoor Desk Fan W/Clip, Adjustable Tilt, Rotates 360, White. Pretty much useless for AZ summer weather. My grandson to blow air faster that what this fan puts out. Might be good for a baby room but slots are too far apart %26 could be dangerous. Was just trying to find a bright side for this fan/product. Sorry, but don't recommend.

reviews.title: Really really nice for the price!!!
reviews.review_text: It was plenty easy to attach the base then clip it onto a table for a test run. This is an unbelievably nice looking fan for less than ten dollars. It doesn't move enough air to start a sharknado but it will help circulate more air in my small grow tent. I have no idea how long this fan will run although these things typically last a long time. I am already ordering another one.

reviews.title: A very quiet fan
reviews.review_text: If you want a quiet Hey and then this is the one to get . I originally had to return my first one. because it kept rattling and it would rattle in a very weird pattern. meaning I like the sound of a fan when I'm trying to sleep but this rattle kept changing patterns and waking me up.

reviews.title: Small train coming through
reviews.review_text: I received the box in the mail and noticed that it came from the return center. That's not a big deal. Returned items typically get put back into circulation. I opened it up. It was dirty. Whatever. I cleaned it off. It was easy to put together (one screw). I plugged it in and turned it on. Things started off well. It blows a good amount of air, sufficient for its size. It was quite soothing until a subtle little thump thump thumping started. And then it got louder. And louder. And louder. It seems the motor is vibrating inside the plastic caseing. Then another fun sound started. This one was a high pitched eeeeeeee that sounded somewhat metallic. I have no idea what that was about but that one was a deal breaker. It's going back to the store. Also, take notice that the padding inside of the clip is not thick enough to protect your furniture from the edges of the plastic.

reviews.title: Just an easy blow of air
reviews.review_text: I purchased this to clip on my treadmill, but it's not very strong, so it doesn't keep me as cool as I would have liked - not even with a second fan there. It was too late to return it, so I brought it to work. This fan is fine for "lighter" cooling uses, like if you're sitting, but not if you need to cool down after a workout.

reviews.title: No working
reviews.review_text: After few weeks After using the fan for about two or three weeks, the low-speed button stopped working. It no longer stays on the low speed, which is really inconvenient. I would like to request a replacement and have a new one sent to me. Thank you!

So i expect a lot out of a fan. after opening the box the low speed hardly spun the blade. high wasn't much better, but gave it a shot to see if it was just a tight fit that would loosen up. it did! but, it doesn't blow hard enough to keep my head cool from 3 ft away at night.

reviews.title: Short Review After 1 Year
reviews.review_text: I bought 4 of these fans last year (April 2024). All 4 have broken in the same exact spot (the clip that holds them onto whatever you put them on). In my case, I've had all 4 fans on a seedling grow shelf and have never once moved them. 2 of the clips snapped within the first year. And, oddly enough, the other 2 clips snapped within 24 hours of each other (July 17 and 18 of 2025). Definitely not build for long term use.

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: I have about 6 of these, that I have been using for my grow room. First off I've come to realize they don't even blow air which you would think, it is a fan how is that even possible! But, they literally blow no air. Secondly they've been attached to my shelves undisturbed. and they literally have just broken. The clips have literally just broke. They are never moved, touched or anything. I just finally realized that my plants weren't moving and then I felt them and there was no air coming out of them. And then they have just fallen off my shelves. The clips just snap and fall off. These have been the absolute worst fans and an absolute waste of my hard earned money.

Maybe you’ll get one that works and comes with the clip or maybe not. But, good luck if you do buy. :) ♡

reviews.review_text: Perfect size for a desk. Works great!

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: The fan is too heavy to stay clipped and does not rotate.

reviews.title: Perfect little fan
reviews.review_text: Very sturdy especially the clamp. It clips on to my shelf ledge perfectly.

reviews.title: Product was dirty
reviews.review_text: Product arrived dirty and with hair stuck in the magnet part of the clip. With all of the virus panic happening right now, that's the last thing I wanted to see.

reviews.title: Misleading ad. Poor description
reviews.review_text: Ordered online, which I hate doing. I like looking at what I'm buying. When received and opened, I was immediately disappointed. The fan guard was a little over 6" and the fan blade was a fraction over 5". Plugged it in and set it to high and could hardly feel the air flow. The ad said 15CM. Nowhere, did the literature describe what 15CM meant. Assuming the meaning meant 15 cubic meters per minute, wrong. Air flow was more like 15 cubic meters per hour. Returned fan for refund.

reviews.title: Great little fan
reviews.review_text: Good product, fast shipping. A little pricey but its winter and they are hard to find at any price.

reviews.title: worthwhile
reviews.review_text: Works great and my stepdaughter loves it!

reviews.title: fan
reviews.review_text: Had to return it. Thought it was oscillating. It was not.

reviews.title: Looking for Clips to replace the ones that broke f
reviews.review_text: This isn't exactly a review I like the fan I have two of them the clip-on 6in but I am trying to find out if I could get replacement clips Unfortunately they do not last long

I bought two these in one sitting and one was burn up straight out the box I went to Walmart they said you have to do it online I think itâs pretty sore when you buy something at Walmart.com and you canât even take it back to Walmartï¿¼

reviews.title: NOT like they use to be!
reviews.review_text: Motors poop out only after a few weeks use. I've had to order 8 to get maybe 3 "good ones". Whoever is making the motors nowadays is doing a poor job. These use to last forever.

reviews.title: Low level means high level!
reviews.review_text: Not what I expected, will be returning due to high level on the lowest setting. Was planning to use for my daughters bed bunk but is too fast on lower speed, what I need is one that can automatically turns

reviews.title: So worth it!
reviews.review_text: I have used this fan every night for 4 years, and it still works. It has a few issues such as the switch can become disconnected, but that is a quick fix and as long as you are careful you wont have that issue in the first place. I have used other fans, but none have gained my respect like the CZ6Z. Plus, its easy to repair and clean (it technically doesn't work without being jumpstarted now, but for a fan that has run for 10,000+ hours, I count that as a success, plus it still functions once i get it started).

reviews.title: great fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this fanand just received itin the last few days.I have attached it to my deskand so far it is doing well. I needed it for my computerwhich overheatsafter it's been on a while?so far it is serving the purposeof what I got it for?would recommend this productas a personal fan.

reviews.title: Great and powerful little fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I recently tried my new Comfort Zone-Comfort Zone 6” 2-Speed Desk Fan with Clip and Adjustable Tilt in White Comfort Zone - Comfort Zone 6” 2-Speed Desk Fan with Clip and Adjustable Tilt in White. What a great little fan! It is quite strong for a small fan, and extremely quiet! There is also a low setting as well, which also blows air quite nicely. The only thing that would make it any better (in my opinion) is if you were also able to use it with batteries!

reviews.title: Little but Powerful
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This little fan is so powerful I have to have it on low and not high. They're great for my hot flashes, it's not too noisy I use it at my desk at work. I was very surprised at the power that came out of this little thing.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We love the Comfort Zone 6" 2 speed desk fan. My daughter and I both have one. It fits fine of both of our desks and it works great. The fan rotates 360°, it has a sliding off switch in the bed and tilts up and down.

reviews.title: Excellent price
reviews.review_text: This was a gift for my son which he likes it and says that it works good. I love the fact that the price was way lower than fans that I priced, they were the same size which were about $8 - $10 more! I'm my boo it's an excellent choice. I would recommend it for anyone that needs a fan for work or for home!

reviews.title: It's ok.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have the 6 inch clip on desk fan with adjustable tilt in white, and I really thought it would give out more air than what it does. There is a high and a low button and it works when you are sweating in this Texas heat.

reviews.title: It does the job!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] For some reason, when they built my house they didn't install an AC vent in the room I use for an office, so it gets toasty with two computers running 24/7. This fan does a great job of helping me keep cool when it gets warmer throughout the day, wouldn't want to do my work without it humming along between my monitors.

reviews.title: 6 Inch Clip-On Fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] 2 speeds. Firm grip clamp. Fan head rotates 360 degrees. Adjustable tilt for airflow in any direction. Whisper quiet sounding on low speed. Only thing I don't care for is the sliding power switch is on the back of the fan.

reviews.title: This fan is amazing!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So in the midst of Michigan Summers - this fan has alleviated so many hot flashes and symptoms! It has been a Godsend. Super easy to set up....just clip it, plug in and switch on the setting you want. It's awesome

reviews.title: Great bathroom fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I needed a small fan that will clamp onto a shelf for an interior bathroom with inadequate ventilation. This has a simple electrical plug instead of a USB cord (the rechargeable types of fans seem to lose power quickly or stop working altogether). It is lightweight and is fairly quiet.

reviews.title: Awesome Little Fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My husband is a fireman who drives the back half of the firetruck or as it's known the tiller. The tiller area gets extremely warm in the summer. Finding this Comfort Zone - 6" Clip-On Desk Fan with Adjustable Tilt has been awesome to give him some relief on super hot days working!

reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I wanted a small fan that was portable to take to work and on trips. For work everyone in my office likes to have the heat on during the winter and I do not like being hot. The strong clamp allows me to hook the desk fan to my monitor risers and stay cool throughout the day. The low speed does not offer much to me, but being on high is great. The fan rotates and tilts with ease. I also like taking the small fan on trips as I like the white noise while I sleep.

reviews.title: Little Desk Fan that Packs a Punch
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This little fan has a surprising amount of power for its size. While it won't cool your entire room, it does do a fantastic job of keeping you cool while working at your desk. I noticed that the air travels roughly 7 feet before dropping off significantly. Would definitely recommend this for people who game or work from home.

reviews.title: Great desk fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I clip this right on to my monitor and it blows and keeps me cool through the day. I had a problem with not being able to control the temperature in my office, so I bought this fan and I'm very satisfied. It's quieter than the other fan I had previously.

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a convenient little fan as long as you have a plug close by. It would work better as an inside fan just because it will cool you faster that outside in the hot heat. Especially if you live in the south!

reviews.title: WORKS WELL!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Comfort Zone 6-Inch Clip Fan includes a padded clamp that has great hold, allowing placement almost anywhere, while providing stability. The head tilts up or down with the simple turn of a knob, then locks in place by tightening. It also spins all the way around, just by clicking into each position. There are two speed settings - low and high, located at the power switch. Either choice works well at circulating air, without being too noisy. I would certainly recommend this portable product to others.

reviews.title: Great little fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great little fan! I need the background noise of a fan to sleep but also get cold easily so I've been clipping it onto my nightstand at night. It's easy to put away when you're not using it too.

reviews.title: A shopper of Walmart. Walmart sells fans
reviews.review_text: I live in an area that is quite warm. I live in Arizona and it's 98 Degrees and it can go up to a hundred and twenty degrees I buy these little fans they're $11. I have them on my electronics. They I live in an RV recreational vehicle. I have one of those fans aiming at my DVD player oh, my VHS player. But I have it also in the cabinet that keeps the heat down on my DirecTV satellite monitor. I have one outside shooting cool air in on my RV refrigerating unit. In the summertime they don't keep cool and your food is at about 45-50 degrees. You can't do that I aim a fan inside that door to my refrigerator. And I plug it in outside and it blows constant cool air on the refrigeration unit. Keeping my freezer down to 5 to 0 degrees and it keeps my refrigerator at 30 degrees. Food last longer. My beer is cool and cold. My milk stays fresh. that's what happens when you live in Arizona the high temperatures destroy your your refrigerators and your electronics because it runs non-stop to try to stay cool and they can't do it they burn I just had a microwave go out on me because of the heat I was boiling water. and I have a small 2 cubic foot refrigerator with a freezer and a refrigerator unit I put one of the fans blowing air to the coolant and the cooling of the refrigerator. these fans for $11 I have three of them. That keep all of my appliances cool and running properly. You may want to put one and your RV on your electronics you know most electronics are in cabinets it gets warm in there even if you leave the door open.

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This desk fan is absolutely perfect for my work space! I find myself running hot and love having constant air blowing in my face while I'm working. This little nifty fan attaches perfectly to my desk and is very sturdy and durable! Highly recommended if you are looking for a great little fan for yourself or little ones! It's powerful too!

reviews.title: Ok fan but the clip sucks
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This may be a problem unique to me but i doubt it. I found that although the clip could be plenty wide at times, the gripping power was kind of lacking. Almost no surface in my room would even hold it securely(i can get it on there but the weight would pull it down or a slight knock would). It need to be thin enough but also deep enough for the clip to actually work. Also the cable was too short for my needs. Anywhere near a socket was not able to reliably grip and anywhere it could grip would need an extension cord.

reviews.title: Does what a fan should do, but a little loud
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The fan and clip are bigger than I expected, which is kind of nice. You also attach the clip yourself, so you have some control of how you can clip it on to your surface of choice. The fan blows a nice amount of air, my only complaint is that it is on the loud side so it isn't super office-friendly.

reviews.title: Big Fan of this Product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I work from home at my desk all day and do not have air conditioning in my office so I am constantly working to keep cool, especially in the summer. This product is perfect size, power, and convenience for working from home and was the perfect addition to my office set up. I am especially happy that it does not take up surface area on my desk and does is not too loud to disrupt virtual meetings with noise. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like the comfort zone 6" 2-Speed Desk fan. I like that it has a clip and a adjustable tilt. I can't wait to be able to use it in the spring. I will clip it to my desk and stay cool. I recommend buying this fan. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] To be honest I have to admit I wasn't expecting much from this small of a fan. But I am pleasantly surprised. You get a very nice breeze. Perfect size for my desk at work. It runs quietly and smoothly. I highly recommend this fan.

reviews.title: Love this fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've had this product for about a week and I must say I'm impressed! The quality of the fan itself is very good and the speed settings are just right, plus you can clip it to a side table and it's adjustable! Highly recommend purchasing this!

reviews.title: Perfect size!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this Comfort Zone 2 speed fan. I use it on my desk in my office. It's great when it gets too warm from the sun coming in the window and it's perfect when a co worker has put on too much body spray :). It's quite and compact. Works Perfectly as intended and I highly recommend you give it a try!

reviews.title: Great affordable little fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a generous sized personal fan. It comes very well packaged and is easy to assemble. The directions are clear. It has 2 fan speeds and runs quietly. The clip is strong and holds the fan securely in place.

reviews.title: Works great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This fan is simple, straightforward and does what it says it will do. It has multiple speeds which is a great feature for a small fan. I utilize it in an office and the volume is low especially on the slower speed. The clip works great and overall I have no complaints.

reviews.title: Solid little desk fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This fan is perfect to use in my office on a hot day or just to air out the room. The fan is solid and can be rotated at 360 degrees. It is not completely quiet but the noise is not unbearable. After all, it does what a fan is supposed to do! Overall, I am happy with this fan.

reviews.title: Great Fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Comfort Zone - 6" Clip-On Desk Fan with Adjustable Tilt, Black is a great little personal fan that blows quite powerfully. It's the perfect size to clip on my desk, table, or in a greenhouse tent. The motor is nice and quiet, and it actually tilts 360 degrees and it tilts so that it can reach any angle that I want it to blow air. I'm really glad that it has an actual cord and not a usb charger. This is one powerful fan!

I hate being hot at night. Love this fan. Exactly what I wanted, to clip to my bed frame to blow on me at night. Has two speeds. The slower is quieter and sufficient to keep me cool all night long. Also creates a mild pleasant sound that helps me sleep also.

reviews.title: Perfect size fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Comfort Zone - 6" Clip-On Desk Fan with Adjustable Tilt back is perfect! Very well made, the clip actually stays on the desk without coming off. Gives a great amount of cool air! Perfect for putting on a desk!

reviews.title: Perfect compact desk fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My new Comfort Zone 6” 2-Speed Desk Fan with Clip and Adjustable Tilt is a perfect addition to my desk! The clip is perfect to use to adjust and get a great place to sit your fan. The two speeds are great settings and really help you personalize your comfort level. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Handy little fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Quality, simple and easy to use little fan. My office was stuffy and I was looking for a little fan to help with cooling. This fan is perfect. It's easy to clip anywhere and works perfectly. It's also surprisingly powerful.

reviews.title: Powerful little fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I needed a fan for my son's room. His is the hottest in the house and during the summer gets pretty warm. This fan is easy to assemble straight out of the box. Just screw on the clip with the enclosed screw. It plugs into the wall which I appreciate. One less charging cord to keep track of. It clips easily onto his desk. I was shocked at the power this little fan has! It blows a nice cool breeze clear across the room. He is very happy to have his own personal fan that he can direct to wherever he is in the room. It's nice and quiet too so it works well for sleeping. The small size is perfect and doesn't take up a lot of space.

reviews.title: Great Little Fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] We are using this little fan in the bedroom. I am usually cold and my husband is always hot. The fan is nice because you can either stand it upright or clip to the night stand. Our fur baby often jumps into bed with us and she likes the breeze on her. The fan is fairly quiet so I can sleep. All and all, the whole family is happier when we sleep. I am glad I have the fan.

reviews.title: great fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] There are two settings for speed with off in the middle which is nice so you don't have to click through one to get to the other. It has a nice heavy clip that is sturdy and stays where you put it. It is very quiet.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So happy with this fan. It's a perfect size for a desk and night stand. The fan is small, study and quiet. It cools off the area you are and it has the perfect amount of power. I liked it so much that I went out and purchased 2 more.

reviews.title: I love this little fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Comfort Zone 6" clip-on desk fan is a great little fan. It Clips on to my desk with no problems. It has foam pads on the clip to keep a good grip on the desk. The speeds are great for the area that my desk takes up. My only complaint is that the clip part doesn't rotate much more the what's pictured. The fan itself rotates but the clip can't be put on a cubicle wall in front of you or something like that. It has to go on a desk. But like I said its a great fan.

reviews.title: Quiet as a whisper
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was very excited to try out my new desk fan. The first thing I noticed was the fan is very light and durable. I plugged it in and was surprised how quiet the fan motor is at both speeds. The fan clip is very strong and is padded to give added grip. Once clipped, the fan can be tilted vertically and horizontally to give the best cooling experience. My home office gets the afternoon sun, so this fan is perfect addition. I love it!!

reviews.title: Perfect size for your desk
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This fan will work great for a desk with an extra outlet. I was kind of hoping it had an USB connecter in order to plug it into my computer instead of an outlet. It is a fan, good size like I said for a desk, but you do need to have an extra outlet close by.

reviews.title: Comfort zone 2 speed desk fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This 6” comfort zone desk fan is perfect size for your desk at home or at work. The temperature at my work isn't consistent so it gets hot quite a bit! It is exactly what I needed to keep me cool while at my desk

reviews.title: Not even Worth the Price.
reviews.review_text: This 6inch fan is very weak. Has 2 settings and still wont cut it. I bought this to use in my camper and was very disappointed. Unfortunately, by the time i could return it, i lost the box it came in. The 6in 12 volt fan is much stronger blowing air than this one, so ill just get that one.

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Surprisingly, this little fan moves a decent amount of air. It is really convenient with the clip. I just hook it to the side of my desk at the office. I would definitely recommend this product to others.

reviews.title: Awesome fan!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Awesome fan! Absolutely perfect to clip on your computer monitor and move the air around. Love having the clip and the ability to move it around. Smaller size, adjustable and quiet. Nice addition to my office.

reviews.title: Small but amazing!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love this clip on desk fan. It is just the right size for any desk space. It is very convenient and easy to use. I also like that you can tilt the fan and it is adjustable. It does not take long at all to charge. You should try it!

reviews.title: Handy size
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I got the Comfort Zone 6 inch clip on desk fan and use it both in the office to circulate air but also in the bathroom while getting ready to go out. It is a handy size and clips on to surfaces and allows you to direct the air where you need it most.
Very small, weak blowing, and doesn't stay locked in place. I would not recommend this product.
The clip Doesn’t have enough non skid dots to keep it from slipping off wherever you clip on

reviews.title: I’m impressed
reviews.review_text: Very good value for the money. Easy to put together. Very strong clip to put on almost anything. Two different speeds.

reviews.title: Best little fan
reviews.review_text: This was perfect size, and very quiet, and great price. It clipped right on the headboards, and has been the right solution for us.

reviews.title: Money Wasted
reviews.review_text: Disliked everything. Purchased to replace a clip on where the clip broke off. This fan DOES NOT put out any air. What LITTLE air is expelled comes from to top or bottom NOT directly from the front of the fan. A TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY.

reviews.title: Waste of Money
reviews.review_text: This things keeps stopping and going all by itself....I can hear the motor going out. If I hadn’t trashed the box, I would’ve taken it back. Very disappointed!!!!!!

reviews.title: Clip on fan
reviews.review_text: I don`t think there is enough adjustment and it`s not tight it flops around loose don`t know if I got a bad one or if they are all like this. It`s just ok, I am using it but not satisfied.

reviews.title: Two fans didn't work
reviews.review_text: I purchased two of these fans. I had one in the past that lasted awhile but these two fans neither one works right. Besides being quite noisy, they speed up than slow down continuously! I haven't been able to use them, very disappointing

ordered this and it came with in 2 days bought it for my daughters crib because she tends to sweat alot in her sleep and likes to sleep with fan on her. the air blows out alot kinda surprised about that

I like it i bought a set of 2 wich where perfect for my kids bunk bed its been months and they still work used daily the only thing would be since its small its alright not too much not too little has 2 speed but my boys use the highest setting

reviews.title: Pleased with the portable fan.
reviews.review_text: The small fan came quickly and was easy to assemble. It had only one screw to attach. It has 2 speeds and will adjust in different directions. It’s just what I needed.

reviews.title: Nice Little Fan
reviews.review_text: Good little fan to clip on the headboard. Has two speeds. Works well for direct blow in your face or can be turned up or down or side to side. Not too noisy unless you're a really light sleeper.

reviews.title: It's affodable. Less than $20 and works perfect
reviews.review_text: It's perfect for my desk. When the hot flashes but it's my face that's gets the worse. I bought one and works wonderful. It clamps on and has two speeds.....Love it

reviews.title: Great Fan For Bunk Beds
reviews.review_text: I got this for my son to use in his bunk bed. It's clips on to the top bunk perfectly and he can position it anywhere .. The only this is he says he wishes it was a little bit more powerful.

reviews.title: Saved the Day
reviews.review_text: Item shipped well. Daughter used it for summer camp. Clipped on her bunk and she was able to turn it throughout the night and stayed cool. The screw to assemble it was a little loose but it was ok

reviews.title: Don’t buy this fan
reviews.review_text: It stopped working after 20 minutes of use. I bought two fans the other one is still working

reviews.title: its ok
reviews.review_text: its alright. nothing like the good reviews though. the clip broke in 3 days

reviews.title: Ok fan.
reviews.review_text: I brought it to clip onto my treadmill, but it doesn't stay put. Air output is good.

reviews.title: Good value!
reviews.review_text: Good fan. Made for small spaces. Nice quality and good price.
bought 2 for our pop up camper, for extra air in the bed area's. they worked very well and we were highly pleased with this product.

reviews.title: Mikefoster8
reviews.review_text: Nice little fan for the price. I'm in a nursing home noise is low on high can't hear on low. Has supprising powerful air pressure

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t blow much air, but I can’t imagine many 6in fans that do. This is first 6in I’ve tried. 3-4ft away one can feel a breeze.

reviews.title: Easy Breezy
reviews.review_text: This fan clips to my desk at work nicely, is very quiet, and provides just the right amount of additional cooling that I need to make me comfortable.

reviews.title: Clíp Up Fan
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. I use it to keep my cable TV box cool since it is inside a wall unit. Love it and recommend it.

reviews.title: Dont bother..
reviews.review_text: Not stong enough. I have a Mainstays one that was same $ and works much better, and comes with the base option. Save time and buy the Mainstays fan
Lowest setting is very quiet. Highest setting can be heard but still very quiet fan. I don't know its on except for the little breeze.

reviews.title: Great for loft bed.
reviews.review_text: I wanted this for my grandson’s loft bed and couldn’t find one anywhere. I was so glad Walmart.com had one. Delivery was right on time.

reviews.title: Poor reliability
reviews.review_text: Junk- Didn't start when I switched on once in the first 30 days. It has now been a few month longer and it doesn't turn on any more.

reviews.title: good purchase
reviews.review_text: grear price for around $6 a unit. The only thing i would change is how you can angle it better which i did by cutting plastic.

reviews.title: Fan
reviews.review_text: Worked right out of the box. Just the right size I was looking for to use in our plant nursery. The clip is still holding strong.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: It was exactly what I needed when a hot flash hit me.

reviews.title: I'm a very satisfied customer..
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I was looking for and it was very easy to find during my search..

reviews.title: Great little fan
reviews.review_text: Very nice little fan. Well constructed and appears as if will last forever.

reviews.title: $42 !!!!!!! HAHAHA !!!!
reviews.review_text: It's a great little $7 fan. Wait till Walmart restocks it.

reviews.review_text: I use these fans in my small greenhouse. Perfect for this. They run quiet and are easy to clip on.

reviews.review_text: Pretty good so far. Easy to assemble this fan after unboxing the product. Five stars.

reviews.title: Small but useful.
reviews.review_text: I gat this small fan. For my bathroom space saver unite. I love it.

reviews.title: A loyal fan...

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.review_text: Fan works great and holds firmly to my cymbal stand.

reviews.title: Good product for a good oroce
reviews.review_text: Just perfect for work and clips on to almost anything and saves space
I have to have a fan to sleep. So this was the perfect size to carry on trips.

reviews.title: Nice fan I'd buy again
reviews.review_text: Sometimes it rattles but it's a blessing cuz it's easy to place.

reviews.title: Cover does not come off easily to clean
reviews.review_text: Cover does not come off easily to clean. No thanks.
